item.title: Learning Ocaml
item.description: Programming languages matter. This is the beginning of the OCaml book. It’s been a while since I’ve learned a new language to code in, and now, perhaps, is as good a time as any. the plan Maybe if I spend an hour a day learning (reading and making programs) I’ll be able to “think” in OCaml by the end of the break! Wouldn’t that be great? I think OCaml is a great language to write compilers in, like Haskell.
